code: import semverDiff from'semver/functions/diff';import semverSatisfies from'semver/functions/satisfies';var DEFAULT_VERSION='0.0.0';export function isNewVersion(lastVersion,currentVersion){if(!lastVersion&&!currentVersion){return false;}return semverDiff(lastVersion||DEFAULT_VERSION,currentVersion)!==null;}export function satisifesRange(version,fromVersion,toVersion){var range=">".concat(fromVersion||DEFAULT_VERSION," <=").concat(toVersion);return semverSatisfies(version,range);}
